The following study methods apply to this paper:

* Case study
* Focus group

Explanation: The paper describes a case study involving pre-test interviews with rehabilitant and their family members, followed by a test of the photo frame and post-test interviews. This meets the definition of a case study, which is a research method that involves in-depth examination of a single case or a small number of cases to gain detailed insights into a particular phenomenon or situation. The focus group component refers to the pre-test interviews conducted with each of the four participants, which involved discussing their experiences with the photo frame and related issues.
